reviews.review: I must say, i loved and hated doing 100% of the achievements, while it was really fun, because im dumb, i had to keep redoing an area because either i forgot to destroy a camera, or i messed my steps in a speedrun, but overall, this game is still a fxckxng masterpiece (10/10)

I wouldnt recommend this if you like good games, or dirty cubes, but for those who like dirty cubes, and good games, this is up the alleyway, inside the dumpster (The Dumpster Is Tasty)

Portal is a game i'd recommend to just about anyone. The puzzles are engaging, the level design is top-notch, and the characters are extremely memorable. The main game will usually take between 4-6 hours on your first playthrough, so you can experience it over a few days, or an evening if you're quick- and if you want more, there's plenty of neat achievements and challenge levels to keep you going. 

Overall, it's an instant classic, and unless you just really hate puzzles (or critical thinking in general), there's no reason not to give it a go. You'll be GLaD you did.

poner un portal arriba y otro abajo y caer infinitamente me marea

Good game with amazing puzzles and good graphics, can't believe that this game was launched in 2007 looking at graphics. Humour in this game "Speedy thing goes in, speedy thing goes out" man that's amazing. Also don't miss the ending song of portal it's really good. I was a bit sad when i was promised a cake but did't get any but it's a minor gripe. The game length leaves something to be desired but you can always try advanced levels those are a whole different level of difficulty all-together. Still it is highly recommended from my side.

Probably one of the most flawless video games ever made. I really appreciate that the final level is a culmination of everything you learned while playing. The main campaign is only 2 hours long and it leaves you wanting more, but thankfully an excellent sequel exists.

i really like this game, story was shorter than expected (finished with like 2 and a bit hours playtime) but theres still bonus maps and such

Loved, loved, loved it! One of the best games I have ever played... though that's not a long list. Every level is a new adventure in creative problem solving. So much fun! I wish I could play it again for the first time.

Look, I know that I'm practically preaching to the choir here but this game is pure amazing. It is one of the most fun and engaging games I've ever played. From the story, to the fact that it isn't just mind-numbing, dumb gameplay. It's a true work of art, and I appreciate Valve for making it. However... Portal 2 is a game as well... You wouldn't think the sequel would be better but... I guess you'll just have to find out.
The classic Portal puzzle game, still excellent today. I wish more games like this came out.
Great game. First time a puzzle game has ever drawn me into the world and actually made me care about the game!
Soooo glad I got this. First stream purchase and I'm highly chuffed . Thanks.
